name: Battle Survive Hentai
description:
Battle Survive Hentai is a third person shooter, you will fight other for your lives.

Battle Survive Hentai puts you in the chaos of war. Gunshots are ringing in your ears and enemies are everywhere ! Can you survive on this island ? . Finding enemies in area and shoot out all them in battle. You need kill all enemies to become the last winner. Be ready to fight do whatever you want to do for survive and become last people standing.

Features:

Many kind of weapons.
The game 3d with many type enemies.
Collect more weapon and item by defeat your enemies.

Battle Survive Hentai is a fast paced battle area, all you have to do is stay alive. Prove your skill in best battle survive game. Only one rule in this battle : Kill or be Killed .
